charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to transport undocumented aliens within the United States .   PENALTY :  Not more than 10 years and or $ 250,000.00 , $ 100.00 Special Assessment $ 5,000.00 Special Assessment . Not more than a 3 Year Term of Supervised Release(1)

Transport &; attempt to transport undocumented aliens for financial gain  .   PENALTY :  Not more than 10 years and or $ 250,000.00 , $ 100.00 Special Assessment $ 5,000.00 Special Assessment . Not more than a 3 Year Term of Supervised Release(2-5)
